spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe misalignment of internal partitions. The central hall and staircase logic is completely lost. Window placements on the right-hand bay (window seat) are simplified and inaccurate. Door openings do not follow the plan's swing directions or specific locations.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major structural deviations: the Utility Room and WC area are mangled into a single distorted space. The staircase (Crawlspace Access area) is rendered as a flat hallway. Adjacency between the Kitchen and Dining Room is loosely interpreted rather than architecturally mapped.

furniture_mapping.notes: Hallucinated kitchen island that does not exist in the 2D plan. The appliances (range, sink) are placed roughly in the correct zone but lack the specified L-shape and pantry configuration.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good isometric camera angle and consistent lighting. Geometry is clean and free of noise, though the simplicity sacrifices the detail required for architectural verification.

detected_errors.description: Missing staircase/crawlspace access transition and detailed WC partitioning.
Kitchen fixtures misaligned with the L-shaped layout provided in blueprints.
The proportion of the Dining Room relative to the Central Hall is compressed.
Hallucination of a central kitchen island and extra wall openings not present in original plan.
Window seat bay geometry is simplified into a basic block, losing the angled structural detail.
